ai-tika-s0403t29:1_0: Fruits on the Fruit of Non-Returner
ai-tika-s0403t29:2_1: Seven on the first part of the body have a beginning.

ai-tika-s0403t29:2_4: possessing the training of a trainee: possesses understanding with wisdom.
ai-tika-s0403t29:3_0: The Assembly of the Fruits of Non-Returners is finished.

ai-tika-s0403t29:5_2: or his followers are comparable to the Sakyans
ai-tika-s0403t29:5_4: In each case, one who understands is empty;
ai-tika-s0403t29:8_1: In the sixth (story), “Amongst those who are tranquilized,” “It is to be lifted up by one without opposites.”
ai-tika-s0403t29:8_2: Because of the drum of the opposite sex and sublime accumulations beginning with the peacefulness: it is peaceful and sublime, the hard-to-self, the tranquillity, and the tranquillity with the unity and bliss opposite sex. It is peaceful and sublime, sublime, and without defilements.
ai-tika-s0403t29:9_0: The Concentration of Immersion is finished.

ai-tika-s0403t29:11_4: When there is mindfulness of the body and the establishment of mindfulness,
ai-tika-s0403t29:11_6: or to one who has attained perfection and direct-knowledge can be understood at the sixth absorption in the sixth section on the sixth part of knowledge.
ai-tika-s0403t29:11_7: For it is the means of having psychic power that will be generated by psychic power, by direct knowledge and complete destruction of the psychic powers,
ai-tika-s0403t29:11_8: Or alternatively, endurance, mindfulness, and equanimity that is to say, his direct-knowledge .
ai-tika-s0403t29:11_9: Also they also said: “I will enter and remain in the sixth yearning for the sake of the supreme liberations,” and having just attained the sixth liberations.
ai-tika-s0403t29:11_10: And they are not skilled in opposite for insight and doing what is profitable, etc.
ai-tika-s0403t29:11_11: Or alternatively, there is the meaning of the absence of such-and-such a being, the meaning can be regarded thus: “This is the meaning of that, which is this meaning.”
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_0: The attaining of the first jhāna in the fivefold reckoning is said: “When a man has attained the first absorption in the three jhānas in the fivefold reckoning, is accessible to perception and attention accompanied by sense desire,
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_1: When his mindfulness is in conformity with that stagnates, then it is concentration.
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_2: When he is accessible to perception and attention unaccompanied by applied thought, then his understanding partakes of distinction.
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_3: When he is accessible to perception and attention accompanied by dispassion and directed to fading away, then his understanding partakes of penetration” , etc., in the case of this attainment should be understood in the detailed explanation of the kind already described.
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_4: Herein, the first jhāna is one who has reached the first jhāna, etc., in this way: it is the first jhāna of the fine-material jhāna.
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_5: With the complete understanding of the sense desires as object, he beset them by directing the mind onto an object. That is why, having been grasping on “that is to say” the sign of sensual pleasures, the sense desires as its object, the abandoning of sense desires, the firstlying of perception, and the concept ‘perception of concentration.
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_8: For when they see the first jhāna in this way, they are peaceful, sublime, and there is no more subtle than the first jhāna, then their besides, but there is no obligation of the first jhāna remaining in it.
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_9: Therefore it was said: “Here it is shared out.”
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_10: Without applied thought, without sustained thought: of the second jhāna, as follows: in the second jhāna, and third and fourth jhānas.
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_11: Perceptions to perceptions occurring to mind as “confidence” of the first jhāna is necessarily reached by the second jhāna.
ai-tika-s0403t29:12_12: The second jhāna subsides in the second jhāna is the basis for ending the jhāna, in the case of the first jhāna, etc., in the second jhāna, and the third jhānas in the way already described.
ai-tika-s0403t29:13_0: and it is subtlety in the first jhāna, which is accompanied by dispassion, because of re-joicing and expression of the jhānas.
ai-tika-s0403t29:13_1: Conceit is called thorns because of clear vision and virtuous knowledge. That is why it is called “unbounded” .
ai-tika-s0403t29:13_2: Carrying, they confront him, saying: “Extinguishment is your good,”
ai-tika-s0403t29:13_4: For insight is called “relimination of oppositeness” in this way “extinguishment is the path leading to dispassion, dispassion is said to fading away.
ai-tika-s0403t29:13_5: it is an associated with perception and attention accompanied by dispassion.
ai-tika-s0403t29:13_6: It is said in order to development that the noble path to penetration of perceptions, etc., in the case of the first jhāna is said to be the noble path to penetration.
ai-tika-s0403t29:13_7: “For he who exercises: precept or occupations, etc., that is, the meaning is, a nephew, or a recommendation.”
ai-tika-s0403t29:13_8: The same thing should be understood in the same way
ai-tika-s0403t29:14_0: The conclusion of the Sakyans is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t29:15_0: The Book of the Gods is finished.
